title: Currency symbols
content: [Article](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064541/http:/news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/magazine/7923825.stm) about the Indian rupee and other missing currency symbols.

comments.content: These articles pop up now and then, and I’m always amazed at how long it takes. It seems like it would be easy to just hire a foreign firm to design a symbol in thirty days, rush it into use, and let everyone who hates it blame the foreigners for a year or two until everybody gets used to it.

Three screens of BBC blather could have been avoided by Charmap

₨ = U+20A8

Next question?
I always enjoy this kind of discussion in the mainstream media, don't shoot the messenger sii!
